breakfast.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit
breakfast.description: Bacon, Egg & Cheese Biscuit features a warm, buttermilk biscuit brushed with real butter, thick cut Applewood smoked bacon, a fluffy folded egg, and a slice of melty American cheese.

breakfast.name: Egg McMuffin®
breakfast.description: This breakfast sandwich is an excellent source of protein and oh so delicious. We place a freshly cracked Grade A egg on a toasted English Muffin topped with real butter and add lean Canadian bacon and melty American cheese. And all that for 300 calories.

breakfast.name: BACON CHEDDAR GRILLED CHICKEN SANDWICH
breakfast.description: Our grilled chicken breast is topped with two strips of Applewood-smoked bacon and Cheddar, then finished with tangy house-made BBQ ranch, crisp lettuce, tomato, onion and pickles on a Brioche bun.

breakfast.name: Egg McMuffin®
breakfast.description: Our long-running favorite salad, all wrapped up. Crispy breaded chicken tenders with fresh Asian greens, crunchy rice noodles and almonds rolled up in a warm flour tortilla. Served with Oriental vinaigrette on the side.

breakfast.name: Breakfast Tacos
breakfast.description: Three soft corn or flour tortillas with scrambled eggs, meat, salsa and cheese or sour cream

breakfast.name: Breakfast Burrito
breakfast.description: Flour tortilla with crispy herbed potatoes, black or pinto beans, scrambled eggs, meat, salsa and cheese or sour cream.
